jobDescription: Location:100% local remote (will need to be available to meet with clients on a regular basis)  Duration: 3 month contract to hire  Start: ASAP 2-4 years experience in an analytical capacity extracting, formatting, analyzing and reporting on digital marketing acquisition metrics from marketing technology platforms such as: Digital Media, Search Engine Marketing, PPC, eCRM/e-Mail, social media and website performance analyticsHigh proficiency with Google Analytics, GA Premium and/or 360High proficiency and/or certification with Adobe Analytics // OmnitureHigh proficiency with ExcelData visualizer experience, e.g. Tableau – formatting, creating dashboards / views and interpreting data for client reviewAbility to demonstrate critical thinking, analysis, dimensional thinking and curiosity to pursue and analyze historic data trendsAbility to offer some insights, understand the data in contextGenerate reports, format data, use graphing, tables and curves to display trendsIdeal experience on client side or agency with a digital marketing, acquisition contextFinancial services experience preferred but not essentialStrong communications skills are critical, role will be client facing.Packaging Designer - OFF-SITEProofreaderDigital Marketing Account ManagerSenior UX StrategistDigital ProducerWeb Developer - OFF-SITEAssociate Paid Search Specialist
